name: HAM!
description:
HAM!

Jay is a bullied student. One day, "Hunger", a fictional character he drew on paper, becomes real. However, Hunger has his own will and decides whom to eat.

Play as "Hunger" and eat bullies (or anyone even everyone) to show your standing.

This game developed by "Cillop Gibi" team for "Mağara Jam #4" game jam.
Theme: "Hunger" is your superpower!

Controls: 

Movement: W, A, S, D

Eat: Space

--------------------------------------------------------

"Cillop Gibi" Takım Üyeleri
